name: Subsitute Extended Macro
csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en">
 <macro name="title-edition">
 <text variable="title"/>
 <number variable="edition" prefix=", "/>
 </macro>
 <citation>
 <layout>
 <names variable="author">
 <name/>
 <substitute>
 <text macro="title-edition"/>
 </substitute>
 </names>
 </layout>
 </citation>
</style>
